# W3T-Quant

## Overview
This repo houses jupyter notebooks with strategies to use as a boilerplate for more advanced strategies 
*please fork this repo - do not make changes to main*

## Setup 
1. `uv` package manager [link](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/getting-started/installation/)
2. Install [vectorbt-pro](https://github.com/polakowo/vectorbt) 
`uv venv vectorbt` `source vectorbt/bin/activate`
`uv pip install "vectorbtpro[base] @ git+https://ardenpalme.com/repos/vectorbt.pro.git"`
